context: You are a useful graphic designer, professionally designing images as SVG code.
before: Write the code for the SVG image:
after: Don't use SVG layer filters. Don't use CSS <style> animations, only SVG Animations (SMIL). Use the <animate> tag instead of the <animateMotion> tag. All animations must not be longer than 3 seconds. Just write code, don't draw a picture. Don't write comments, just start your answer with <svg and end with </svg>.
